name: SoekedBSD
short_description: A fully featured FreeBSD based OS built for Soekris engineering hardware. Unlike m0n0BSD and m0n0wall which are very limited (no compiler for example) SoekedBSD is intended to be as featured an operating system as a standard FreeBSD installation.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Advanced End Users
